"The Toothbrush of the Future" - A smart toothbrush that tracks your brushing habits and provides personalized recommendations for improving your oral hygiene routine. It could also include features such as pressure sensors, UV sterilization, and a companion app that reminds you to brush regularly. Confidence score: 0.9

"Toothbrush with Built-in Microphone" - A toothbrush that includes a built-in microphone that can play music or podcasts while you brush. This could be a great way to make brushing more enjoyable and pass the time. Confidence score: 0.7

"Toothbrush with Biodegradable Bristles" - A toothbrush with biodegradable bristles that are made from sustainable materials. This could be a great way to reduce waste and help protect the environment. Confidence score: 0.8

"Toothbrush with LED Lighting" - A toothbrush that includes LED lighting that illuminates the bristles and provides a brighter, more comfortable brushing experience. This could be especially useful for people with poor eyesight or for brushing in low-light conditions. Confidence score: 0.6

"Toothbrush with Augmented Reality" - A toothbrush that includes augmented reality technology that overlays a virtual image of your teeth on top of the real-age teeth. This could be a great way to help people visualize the areas of their mouth that they need to brush more thoroughly. Confidence score: 0.5
